text: Trailer Tuesday sees us managing the door at a night club, deciding what to do while driving the open road, and running bunny bakeries. Afterlove EP “Step into the shoes of Rama, a young musician struggling to move on with life after the death of his girlfriend, Cinta.” Afterlove EP is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, Humble Games Store, GOG, and Steam. The End of the Sun “As the ashter, a sage sorcerer gifted with the ability to travel in time, you come to a mysterious village where the line between myth and reality begins to fade perilously.” The End of the Sun is available now on Steam. Cinnabunny “Cinnabunny is a cozy life simulator game where you play as a bunny who runs a bakery.” Cinnabunny is available now on Steam. Everseeker: Little Critters “Everseeker is a Hidden Object game and a charming exploration and discovery experience where your goal is to find 100 small insects hidden in a picturesque town of cute rabbits.” Everseeker: Little Critters is available now on Steam. Keep Driving “An atmospheric management RPG about life on the open road. Pick up hitchhikers, work odd jobs, customize and repair your car, and map your route across the country.” Keep Driving is available now on Steam. Dawnfolk “Gather resources, rebuild your realm, and protect your people from oppressive shadows. Can you unveil the secrets of the monoliths to bring light back to the world?” Dawnfolk is available now on Steam. ReSetna “Fight through hordes of corrupted machines, upgrade your abilities, traverse treacherous environments and explore to uncover the truth of what happened.” ReSetna is available now on Steam. Techno Banter “You’re the bouncer of the Green Door club, where every decision matters. Reject the unworthy of partying with clever retorts, explore a neon-lit city, and immerse yourself in the Berlin-like city’s underground techno scene.” Techno Banter is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, GOG, and Steam. LUCE “Help our main character find a way out while overcoming their fear of the dark.” LUCE is aviailable now on itch.io. Laika: Aged Through Blood “Play as Laika, a coyote mother and fierce warrior, and carve your motorbike through a land ravaged by betrayal and loss as you uncover dark secrets in the pursuit of vengeance against oppression.” Laika: Aged Through Blood is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, Epic Games Store, GOG, and Steam. About The Author Joel Couture Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
html:
Trailer Tuesday sees us managing the door at a night club, deciding what to do while driving the open road, and running bunny bakeries.

Afterlove EP

“Step into the shoes of Rama, a young musician struggling to move on with life after the death of his girlfriend, Cinta.”

Afterlove EP is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, Humble Games Store, GOG, and Steam.

The End of the Sun

“As the ashter, a sage sorcerer gifted with the ability to travel in time, you come to a mysterious village where the line between myth and reality begins to fade perilously.”

The End of the Sun is available now on Steam.

Cinnabunny

“Cinnabunny is a cozy life simulator game where you play as a bunny who runs a bakery.”

Cinnabunny is available now on Steam.

Everseeker: Little Critters

“Everseeker is a Hidden Object game and a charming exploration and discovery experience where your goal is to find 100 small insects hidden in a picturesque town of cute rabbits.”

Everseeker: Little Critters is available now on Steam.

Keep Driving

“An atmospheric management RPG about life on the open road. Pick up hitchhikers, work odd jobs, customize and repair your car, and map your route across the country.”

Keep Driving is available now on Steam.

Dawnfolk

“Gather resources, rebuild your realm, and protect your people from oppressive shadows. Can you unveil the secrets of the monoliths to bring light back to the world?”

Dawnfolk is available now on Steam.

ReSetna

“Fight through hordes of corrupted machines, upgrade your abilities, traverse treacherous environments and explore to uncover the truth of what happened.”

ReSetna is available now on Steam.

Techno Banter

“You’re the bouncer of the Green Door club, where every decision matters. Reject the unworthy of partying with clever retorts, explore a neon-lit city, and immerse yourself in the Berlin-like city’s underground techno scene.”

Techno Banter is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, GOG, and Steam.

LUCE

“Help our main character find a way out while overcoming their fear of the dark.”

LUCE is aviailable now on itch.io.

Laika: Aged Through Blood

“Play as Laika, a coyote mother and fierce warrior, and carve your motorbike through a land ravaged by betrayal and loss as you uncover dark secrets in the pursuit of vengeance against oppression.”

Laika: Aged Through Blood is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, Epic Games Store, GOG, and Steam.

About The Author

Joel Couture

Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
